vernac_cmds: Definition func_set (A B : Setoid) := MAP A B.
Let func_plus_fun : forall (A : Setoid) (B : sgroup), func_set A B -> func_set A B -> func_set A B.
apply (Build_Map (A:=A) (B:=B) (Ap:=fun a : A => Ap f a +' Ap g a)).
Definition func_plus : forall (A : Setoid) (B : sgroup), law_of_composition (func_set A B).
intros f f' g g' Hf Hg.
Lemma func_plus_associative : forall (A : Setoid) (B : sgroup), associative (func_plus A B).
Definition func_sgroup (A : Setoid) (B : sgroup) : SGROUP := Build_sgroup (Build_sgroup_on (func_plus_associative (A:=A) (B:=B))).
Lemma func_plus_commutative : forall (A : Setoid) (B : abelian_sgroup), commutative (func_plus A B).
Definition func_absgp (A : Setoid) (B : abelian_sgroup) : ABELIAN_SGROUP := Build_abelian_sgroup (Build_abelian_sgroup_on (A:=func_sgroup A B) (func_plus_commutative (A:=A) (B:=B))).
Definition func_zerofun : forall (A : Setoid) (B : monoid), func_set A B.
Lemma func_zerofun_is_r_unit : forall (A : Setoid) (B : monoid), unit_r (sgroup_law_map (func_sgroup A B)) (func_zerofun A B).
Lemma func_zerofun_is_l_unit : forall (A : Setoid) (B : monoid), unit_l (sgroup_law_map (func_sgroup A B)) (func_zerofun A B).

Definition func_monoid (A : Setoid) (B : monoid) : MONOID := Build_monoid (Build_monoid_on (A:=func_sgroup A B) (monoid_unit:= func_zerofun A B) (func_zerofun_is_r_unit (A:=A) (B:=B)) (func_zerofun_is_l_unit (A:=A) (B:=B))).
Lemma func_monoid_is_abelian : forall (A : Setoid) (B : abelian_monoid), abelian_monoid_on (func_monoid A B).
Definition func_abmon (A : Setoid) (B : abelian_monoid) : ABELIAN_MONOID := Build_abelian_monoid (func_monoid_is_abelian A B).
Let func_inv_fun : forall (A : Setoid) (B : group), func_monoid A B -> func_monoid A B.
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : A => min v i)).
Definition func_inv : forall (A : Setoid) (B : group), Map (func_monoid A B) (func_monoid A B).
Lemma func_inv_is_r_inverse : forall (A : Setoid) (B : group), inverse_r (func_plus A B) (func_zerofun A B) (func_inv A B).
Lemma func_inv_is_l_inverse : forall (A : Setoid) (B : group), inverse_l (func_plus A B) (func_zerofun A B) (func_inv A B).
Definition func_group (A : Setoid) (B : group) : GROUP := Build_group (Build_group_on (group_inverse_map:=func_inv A B) (func_inv_is_r_inverse (A:=A) (B:=B)) (func_inv_is_l_inverse (A:=A) (B:=B))).
Lemma func_group_is_abelian : forall (A : Setoid) (B : abelian_group), abelian_group_on (func_group A B).
Definition func_abgp (A : Setoid) (B : abelian_group) : ABELIAN_GROUP := Build_abelian_group (func_group_is_abelian A B).
Definition func_scmult_fun : forall (A : Setoid) (B : ring), B -> func_set A B -> func_set A B.
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : A => c rX v i)).
Lemma func_scmult_fun_comp : forall (A : Setoid) (B : ring) (c c' : B) (v v' : func_set A B), c =' c' in _ -> v =' v' in _ -> func_scmult_fun c v =' func_scmult_fun c' v' in _.
Let func_scmult_fun_map : forall (A : Setoid) (B : ring), B -> MAP (func_set A B) (func_set A B).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun v : func_set A B => func_scmult_fun c v)).
Let func_scmult_F_to_EndoSet : forall (A : Setoid) (B : ring), Map (Build_monoid (ring_monoid B)) (Endo_SET (func_set A B)).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun c : B => func_scmult_fun_map A (B:=B) c)).
Let func_scmult_sgroup_hom : forall (A : Setoid) (B : ring), sgroup_hom (Build_monoid (ring_monoid B)) (Endo_SET (func_set A B)).
apply Trans with ((c rX c') rX v i); auto with algebra.
Let func_scmult_monoid_hom : forall (A : Setoid) (B : ring), monoid_hom (Build_monoid (ring_monoid B)) (Endo_SET (func_set A B)).
apply Trans with (one rX v i); auto with algebra.
Definition func_scmult : forall (A : Setoid) (B : ring), operation (Build_monoid (ring_monoid B)) (func_group A B).
Lemma func_scmult_l_lin : forall (A : Setoid) (B : ring), op_lin_left (Mod:=func_abgp A B) (func_scmult A B).
Lemma func_scmult_r_lin : forall (A : Setoid) (B : ring), op_lin_right (Mod:=func_abgp A B) (func_scmult A B).
Definition func_mod (A : Setoid) (B : ring) : MODULE B := Build_module (Build_module_on (func_scmult_l_lin (A:=A) (B:=B)) (func_scmult_r_lin (A:=A) (B:=B))).
Definition func (A : Setoid) (B : field) : VECSP B := func_mod A B:vectorspace B.

command: apply (Build_Map (A:=A) (B:=B) (Ap:=fun a : A => Ap f a +' Ap g a)).
intros f f' g g' Hf Hg.
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : A => min v i)).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun i : A => c rX v i)).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun v : func_set A B => func_scmult_fun c v)).
apply (Build_Map (Ap:=fun c : B => func_scmult_fun_map A (B:=B) c)).
apply Trans with ((c rX c') rX v i); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (one rX v i); auto with algebra.
